name: Candy Fruit King - Match 3 Splash Free Games
name_original: Candy Fruit King - Match 3 Splash Free Games
description:
Fruits Garden is a new 3-match FREE game. It is more challenging and more interesting. With excellent graphics , you may never get bored in Secret Fruits Garden. Of course, props could always be the booster in your game adventure!
Fruits Garden features:
● Surprises for you in each level
● Over 100 levels for you to challenge. More levels coming soon!
● Lovely graphics and powerful boosters!
● Gold coins and silvers can be Free got to help you pass levels

How to play:
1. Match 3 or more same type to clear them.
2. Win the levels before you run out of moves. It's so easy.

Fruits Garden is a free time killer. Thank you for your downloads!
